page.title: 04Employment
page.content: We took some questions about employment & unemployment and asked 20 people about their employment,and we found that 13 of the people were unemployed while 7 were employed.We asked people if they thought that employment had changed over the years and many said that things had changed for the worst since the Tories came into power.Ten out of thirteen employed people were not in a trades union.The Employment Centre told us that on{9/5/85 }1,974 men and 1,263 women were unemployed in the Hinckley & Bosworth region.
